name: Circuitbreaker
description: Circuitbreaker is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its classic box design and soldier buttons, this robot exudes a sense of strength and reliability. Its arms and legs are designed with the hands down position, allowing it to efficiently manipulate and interact with various electronic components. The screen of Circuitbreaker features a unique snake display, providing a visually appealing representation of electrical signals. As an added feature, Circuitbreaker is equipped with a protective helmet addon, ensuring its safety in potentially hazardous environments.
